creator: matt@mattwildig.co.uk
text: Created attachment 27018 Patch adding html anchors to conditions.html I recently wanted to link to a condition on the page at http://ant.apache.org/manual/Tasks/conditions.html, but that page doesn't have individual html anchors for use as the destination of links, unlike other similar pages in the docs. It's fairly big page, and I thought it'd be useful to be able to link to specific conditions on it. This patch adds the destination anchors. I've used style rather than adding id attributes to headers, as this style seems to be used elsewhere in the docs (specifically, I've based this on the selectors.html page). (There was actually an anchor already for the `os` condition, but none of the others).

creator: jglick@apache.org
text: Committed in revision 1127211. I moved the anchors inside the headers, which seems to work better at least in Firefox and seems more intuitive anyway.
